about_the_game:
Four non-randomly mutated beans, who have seen the horrors in the secret laboratory of an evil villain, have escaped to freedom and are thirsty for revenge.

Help the beans break through to their creator’s lair. Destroy everything that stands in your way! The path will become more and more difficult with each passing minute. But revenge is worth the effort.

Armament
You have 4 types of main weapons at your disposal. Each weapon has several levels of upgrades.

In addition to the main weapon, there are some auxiliary ones.

content_descriptors.notes: Some characters in this game are destroyed in the form of an explosion of the body into small pieces. But due to the fact that they are very far from the camera, it is difficult to discern any details.

detailed_description:
Four non-randomly mutated beans, who have seen the horrors in the secret laboratory of an evil villain, have escaped to freedom and are thirsty for revenge.

Help the beans break through to their creator’s lair. Destroy everything that stands in your way! The path will become more and more difficult with each passing minute. But revenge is worth the effort.

Armament
You have 4 types of main weapons at your disposal. Each weapon has several levels of upgrades.

In addition to the main weapon, there are some auxiliary ones.
name: Doomsday Beans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-10870H / AMD Ryzen 7 580H
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 6600M 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Doomsday Bean is an arcade game in the Bullet Hell genre. The player controls an armed car. You have several types of main weapons to choose from.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
